articles.author: Akilah Johnson
articles.title: Scientists discover new clue linking obesity to dementia risk - The Washington Post
articles.description: European researchers trace a path that shows how high blood pressure caused by excess weight could be the link to certain cognitive brain disease.
articles.content:
Obesity in midlife may cause vascular dementia later in life by raising blood pressure over decadesand quietly damaging brain vessels, according to new research released Thursday.
